results.name: wordpress-app/wordpress-ingress

error.Text: Ingress wordpress-app/wordpress-ingress does not specify an Ingress class.

results.details:
Error: The Ingress resource 'wordpress-ingress' in the 'wordpress-app' namespace lacks a specified Ingress class.

Solution: 1. Edit the Ingress manifest. 2. Add `ingressClassName: <your-ingress-class>` under metadata. 3. Apply changes with `kubectl apply -f <your-ingress-file>.yaml`.
